name: Fantasy Mosaics 20
description:
Mr. Penguin and uncle Aaron are planning a surprise trip to visit an ancient castle of puzzles!

Will they discover even more vibrant colors to enrich this new collection of mosaics?

Join the penguins as they bring you new pixel art challenges and discover the inhabitants of the ancient castle!


- Mosaic puzzles with an enhanced color palette also known as picross, hanjie, nonograms, griddlers, paint by numbers

- Pixel art challenges

- Explore an ancient castle

- Puzzles based on logic
